sentences.english: Experiments are being carried on with monorails and other new concepts.
sentences.chinese: 人們正在試驗單軌鐵路以及其他新的設計概念。

sentences.english: Monorail trolley is a kind of ancillary facilities.
sentences.chinese: 單軌小車是一種配套設備。

sentences.english: A monorail station connected to the Kuala Lumpur Monorail is also planned to be built here.
sentences.chinese: 一個通往吉隆坡的單軌鐵路車站也計劃在這裏修建。

sentences.english: On the basis of single track, entrust the defenders to the right of obtaining evidence.
sentences.chinese: 在單軌制偵查構造的基礎上，適當賦予辯方取證權利。

sentences.english: Each plateau will also have a monorail system which will help move people laterally.
sentences.chinese: 每處高地都設單軌鐵路系統實現人們便捷的平面移動。

sentences.english: Many of the stops on Las Vegas's monorail are named after casinos.
sentences.chinese: 在拉斯維加斯的單軌電車站，很多都是以賭場命名。

sentences.english: The features of structure for the straddling monorail train are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了跨座式單軌列車的結構特點。

sentences.english: On the basis of single track, entrust the defenders to the right of obtaining …
sentences.chinese: 在單軌制偵查構造的基礎上，適當賦予辯方取證權利。

sentences.english: Time is needed to completely achieve the single unit of yard-stick measurement.
sentences.chinese: 完全實現度量衡單位的單軌制，需要一個過程。

definition: summary/to summarize/to collect (data, receipts etc)/to gather and report/also written 匯總|汇总
(idiom) to use methods appropriate to the current situation
see 無記名|无记名[wu2 ji4 ming2]
